bug.author: ulf1
bug.summary: Reintroduced Typo in tf.keras.layers.Attention docs example
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/Attention>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/Attention</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Typo was reintroduced in v2.1 See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/34809>#34809</denchmark-link>
must be <denchmark-code>value_embeddings = token_embedding(value_input) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rabitt>@rabitt</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ulf1>@ulf1</denchmark-link> , It is exactly same as you are telling. See the nightly version of the doc <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/Attention?version=nightly>here</denchmark-link>
